title: Jefferies calls Bitcoin a safeguard against currency inflation
description: Jefferies, a prominent global investment bank, advises long-term investors, particularly pension funds, to allocate 10% of their portfolios to Bitcoin, denominated in U.S. dollars.

title: Bitcoin’s Remarkable Rise: A Look Back at its Humble Beginnings 14 Years Ago
